column4: High  Court  Judge  has  considered  the  facts  and  the  way  in  which  he  has

column3: applied the law in this instance.

column4: The Appellant has preferred this appeal  seeking to  set aside the Order
dated  17.06.2008  made  by  the  learned  Magistrate  and  the  judgment  dated
23.06.2010,  pronounced by  the  learned High  Court Judge.  Having perused
the Order and the Judgment, I see no reason to interfere with the decisions of

column3: the learned Magistrate and the learned High Court Judge.
F or the reasons stated above, I dismiss the appeal.

column4: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
